prefix.description: prefix for the save files. A good prefix would be 'YYYY-MM-DD.project_name.'

hts_type.description: Type of analysis (WES or WGS). If WES, --capture (bed) is expected.

bed.description: Path to BED file that was used as the capture. Required for --hts_type=WES.

outdir.description: The output directory where the results will be saved. You have to use absolute paths to storage on Cloud infrastructure.

mapping_fastqs.title: Mapping FASTQs
mapping_fastqs.description: Parameters use to map the reads on a reference genome.

samplesheet.description:
Path to samplesheet with the appropriate suffix (csv or tsv or json).
For **ora** files or **fastq.gz** from illumina/dragen, the 'sample' column is optional as it can be extracted from the fastq name

orad_directory.description: ora-d directory containing the sofwtare used to decrompress .ora files. If not defined, the toolbox is downloaded. (But on glicid it's blocked by the proxy)
orad_directory.help_text: path to ora-d directory used to decrompress .ora files.

mapper.description: wich mapper to use. one of 'bwa,pb,parabricks,dragmap'

known_indels_vcf.description: Path to  VCF indexed with tabix used as source of known indels for BQSR.

with_merge_fastqs.description: If true, merge the reads for the same sample. Always true for mapper=parabricks

with_fastp.description: If true, preprocess the Reads with FASTP before mapping the reads

with_cram.description: Save the alignments as CRAM (always true for parabricks).

bam2fastq_method.description: when the input is a BAM/CRAM to has be converted back to fastq prior to mapping, what is the method to use ?

with_fastqc.description: Run Fastqc. If --with_fastp==true, anothe fastqc is run after trimming.

with_collect_metrics.description: Run Picard Collect Metrics (which can be quite slow for WGS).

mosdepth_use_median.description: use 'median' instead of 'average' to calculate the depth with mosdepth.

mosdepth_min_depth.description: Treshold of total mosdepth coverage. Bam below this treshold withh be affected by '--on_low_bam_quality'.

on_low_bam_quality.description: What to do with BAMs with a depth under the treshold ? abort: stop the workflow. warning : just print a message. skip: skip the bams with a low quality.

somalier_vcf_sites.description: somalier VCF sites. if ignored, VCF is downloaded .

manta_params.title: MANTA
manta_params.description: Manta: Structural variant and indel caller for mapped sequencing data  (https://github.com/Illumina/manta)

with_truvari.description: Apply truvari to merge the VCFs (https://github.com/ACEnglish/truvari)

smoove_params.title: SMOOVE
smoove_params.description: Smoove: 'Structural variant calling and genotyping with existing tools, but, smoothly'.  https://github.com/brentp/smoove

delly_params.title: DELLY2
delly_params.description: DELLY2: Structural variant discovery by integrated paired-end and split-read analysis . https://github.com/dellytools/delly

indexcov_params.title: INDEXCOV
indexcov_params.description: Goleft/indexcov: Quickly estimate coverage from a whole-genome bam or cram index.  https://github.com/brentp/goleft/tree/master/indexcov/

indexcov_batchsize.description: group BAMs by batch of 'x' bams. Useful when manupulating thousands of bams
